statements.query: MATCH (n:AWSAccount)<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount)<-[r:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
